Trade/Device Name(s): Vysis D7S486/CEP 7 Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH) Probe Kit
Regulation Name(s): Early growth response 1 (EGR1) gene fluorescence in-situ hybridization (FISH) test system for specimen characterization
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Vysis D7S486/CEP 7 FISH Probe Kit used to detect chromosomal abnormalities (7q deletion and monosomy 7) via FISH in bone marrow and peripheral blood specimens from AML or MDS patients.
Indications for Use Summary: For specimen characterization detecting LSI D7S486 (7q31) and CEP 7 (7p11.1-q11.1) probe targets in bone marrow and peripheral blood specimens from patients with acute myeloid leukemia or myelodysplastic syndrome; interpretation by qualified pathologist or cytogeneticist; not for high-risk diagnostic, prognostic, or screening purposes.
